Text.Name: LsHelpPlayHappy
Text.Desc: Playing with สัตว์เลี้ยงวิญญาณ has made you feel good all day.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that when one's this cheerful, it really brightens one's day

Text.Name: BiteHappy
Text.Desc: A gentle bite from the สัตว์เลี้ยงวิญญาณ made you feel endorsed.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that It doesn't hurt at all, just a bit itchy

Text.Name: BiteSad
Text.Desc: Slapped hard by the สัตว์เลี้ยงวิญญาณ and it still hurts. It doesn't seem to like me very much.

Text.Name: PetHeal
Text.DisplayName: สัตว์เลี้ยงวิญญาณ in Company
Text.Desc: With the สัตว์เลี้ยงวิญญาณ as company, your mood has become much better.

Text.Name: PetStay
Text.DisplayName: สัตว์เลี้ยงวิญญาณ in Company
Text.Desc: With the สัตว์เลี้ยงวิญญาณ as company, your mood has become much better.
